text: Carletti is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Angelo Carletti di Chivasso (1411–1495), Italian theologian *Beppe Carletti (born 1946), Italian musician *Bertrand Carletti (born 1982), French volleyball player *Cristian Carletti (born 1996), Italian footballer *Cristóforo Chrisostome Carletti (1564–1634), Italian Roman Catholic bishop *Eduardo J. Carletti (born 1951), Argentine science fiction writer *Louise Carletti (1922–2002), French film actress *Massimiliano Carletti (born 1973), Italian footballer *Tommaso Carletti (1860–1919), Governor of Italian Somalia Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Carletti
